name: Camp Carpenter
description:
Arrow Keys to move

Space to interact

Control inventory with mouse (click to use)

Can you get everyone out alive?

Even Angelica?

A game by Phil (morale / story), Andrew (story / morale) and Mark (other stuff /being a gloomy gus).
 

Tile set and characters by MalibuDarby.

Music from DaGameKnower (I think the kids say that it slaps?)

Weird art and stuff generated by MidjourneyAI (Thank you!)
